alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Morrill (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 3:11AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Morrill and Cheyenne County including portions of Interstate 80 near Sidney. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to slick, possibly snow covered roads. Holiday travel may be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow will be possible through Sunday afternoon with localized reductions to visibility even after snowfall ends.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
